name: canshare-mipss-70-v2-prognostic-score
title: NZ cancer MIPSS 70+ v2.0 myelofibrosis prognostic score
description: The prognostic score for myelofibrosis, defined using the Mutation-Enhanced International Prognostic Score System (MIPSS) age seventy-plus version two prognostic scoring system.
